verses.verse: My son <S%H1121><s%>, keep <S%H8104><s%> my words <S%H561><s%>, And lay up <S%H6845><s%> my commandments with thee <S%H4687><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and live <S%H2421><s%>; And my law <S%H8451><s%> as the apple <S%H380><s%> of thine eye <S%H5869><s%>.
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them upon thy fingers <S%H676><s%>; Write <S%H3789><s%> them upon the tablet <S%H3871><s%> of thy heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> unto wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, Thou art my sister <S%H269><s%>; And call <S%H7121><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> thy kinswoman <S%H4129><s%>:
That they may keep <S%H8104><s%> thee from the strange <S%H2114><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>, From the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> that flattereth <S%H2505><s%> with her words <S%H561><s%>.
For at the window <S%H2474><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> I looked <S%H8259><s%> forth through my lattice <S%H822><s%>;
And I beheld <S%H7200><s%> among the simple ones <S%H6612><s%>, I discerned <S%H995><s%> among the youths <S%H1121><s%>, A young man <S%H5288><s%> void <S%H2638><s%> of understanding <S%H3820><s%>,
Passing through <S%H5674><s%> the street <S%H7784><s%> near <S%H681><s%> her corner <S%H6434><s%>; And he went <S%H6805><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to her house <S%H1004><s%>,
In the twilight <S%H5399><s%>, in the evening <S%H3117><s%> of the day <S%H380><s%>, In the middle of the night <S%H3915><s%> and in the darkness <S%H653><s%>.
And <S%H7125><s%>, behold, there met him a woman <S%H802><s%> With the attire <S%H7897><s%> of a harlot <S%H2181><s%>, and wily <S%H5341><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>.
(She is clamorous <S%H1993><s%> and wilful <S%H5637><s%>; Her feet <S%H7272><s%> abide <S%H7931><s%> not in her house <S%H1004><s%>:
Now <S%H6471><s%> she is in the streets <S%H7339><s%>, now <S%H6471><s%> in the broad <S%H7339><s%> places <S%H693><s%>, And lieth in wait at <S%H681><s%> every corner <S%H6438><s%>.)
So she caught <S%H2388><s%> him <S%H5401><s%>, and kissed him <S%H5810><s%>, And with an impudent face <S%H6440><s%> she said unto him <S%H559><s%>:
Sacrifices <S%H8002><s%> of peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%> are with me <S%H3117><s%>; This day have I paid <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%>.
Therefore came I forth <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> thee <S%H7836><s%>, Diligently to seek thy face <S%H6440><s%>, and I have found thee <S%H4672><s%>.
I have spread <S%H7234><s%> my couch <S%H6210><s%> with carpets <S%H4765><s%> of tapestry <S%H2405><s%>, With striped cloths of the yarn <S%H330><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
I have perfumed <S%H5130><s%> my bed <S%H4904><s%> With myrrh <S%H4753><s%>, aloes <S%H174><s%>, and cinnamon <S%H7076><s%>.
Come <S%H3212><s%>, let us take our fill <S%H7301><s%> of love <S%H1730><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>; Let us solace <S%H5965><s%> ourselves with loves <S%H159><s%>.
For the man <S%H376><s%> is not at home <S%H1004><s%>; He is gone <S%H1980><s%> a long <S%H7350><s%> journey <S%H1870><s%>:
He hath taken <S%H3947><s%> a bag <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> with him <S%H3027><s%>; He will come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> at the full <S%H3117><s%> moon <S%H3677><s%>.
With her much <S%H7230><s%> fair speech <S%H3948><s%> she causeth him to yield <S%H5186><s%>; With the flattering <S%H2506><s%> of her lips <S%H8193><s%> she forceth him along <S%H5080><s%>.

He goeth <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> her straightway <S%H6597><s%>, As an ox <S%H7794><s%> goeth <S%H935><s%> to the slaughter <S%H2874><s%>, Or as one in fetters <S%H5914><s%> to the correction <S%H4148><s%> of the fool <S%H191><s%>;

Till an arrow <S%H2671><s%> strike <S%H6398><s%> through his liver <S%H3516><s%>; As a bird <S%H6833><s%> hasteth <S%H4116><s%> to the snare <S%H6341><s%>, And knoweth <S%H3045><s%> not that it is for his life <S%H5315><s%>.
Now therefore <S%H1121><s%>, my sons, hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H7181><s%>, And attend to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Let not thy heart <S%H3820><s%> decline <S%H7847><s%> to her ways <S%H1870><s%>; Go not astray <S%H8582><s%> in her paths <S%H5410><s%>.
For she hath cast down <S%H5307><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> wounded <S%H2491><s%>: Yea <S%H2026><s%>, all her slain are a mighty host <S%H6099><s%>.
Her house <S%H1004><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%>, Going down <S%H3381><s%> to the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.
